    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String newName,
            java.lang.String fileName,
            java.lang.String typeItem,
            int happy,
            int fullness)
        Constructs an Item with the specified attributes. The number of items is initialized to 0.
        Parameters:
        newName - The name of the item.
        fileName - The name of the image file associated with the item.
        typeItem - The type of the item (e.g., food, toy).
        happy - The amount by which the item increases happiness.
        fullness - The amount by which the item increases fullness.

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String newName,
            java.lang.String fileName,
            java.lang.String typeItem,
            int happy,
            int fullness,
            int num)
        Constructs an Item with the specified attributes, including the number of items.
        Parameters:
        newName - The name of the item.
        fileName - The name of the image file associated with the item.
        typeItem - The type of the item (e.g., food, toy).
        happy - The amount by which the item increases happiness.
        fullness - The amount by which the item increases fullness.
        num - The initial quantity of the item.
